text: Pithamaha () is a 1985 Kannada film, directed by K. S. L. Swamy (Ravi) and produced by Singh Brothers. The film stars Rajesh, Udaykumar, V. Ravichandran and Vijayalakshmi Singh in the lead roles.Pithamaha Movie While M. Ranga Rao composed the music, the lyrics and dialogues were written by Chi. Udaya Shankar. The film was a remake of the 1982 blockbuster Hindi film Vidhaata, directed by Subhash Ghai and starring Dilip Kumar, Shammi Kapoor, Sanjeev Kumar and Sanjay Dutt in the lead roles.Vidhaata film == Cast == * Rajesh * Udaykumar * V. Ravichandran * Vijayalakshmi Singh * Sundar Krishna Urs * Jai Jagadish * Dheerendra Gopal * Thoogudeepa Srinivas * Mysore Lokesh * Bank Janardhan * Keerthi Raj * Ashwath Narayan == Soundtrack == The music was composed by M. Ranga Rao, with lyrics by Chi. Udaya Shankar.Pitamaha songs All the songs composed for the film were received well, especially "Mareyadiru Aa Shaktiya" is considered an evergreen song. == References == Category:1985 films Category:Indian films Category:1980s Kannada-language films Category:Indian drama films Category:Films scored by M.
